title: Desert Tourism
author: VD
content_html: Here’s a non-WorldNetDaily link discussing the No Jews Allowed policy of my previous post. The Saudi explanation of a mistake is not credible, considering what I’ve heard of their policies requiring companies dealing with them to guarantee that none of their products contain any Israeli parts.
content_text:
Here’s a
non-WorldNetDaily link
discussing the No Jews Allowed policy of my previous post.  The Saudi explanation of a mistake is not credible, considering what I’ve heard of their policies requiring companies dealing with them to guarantee that none of their products contain any Israeli parts.
